title: ID: Bodoni/Didoni-like ampersand
content:
Looking for the curly ampersand.

comments.content:
Pistilli Roman. (Quite popular these days.)  
Digital version: [Didoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20091128134829/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/name%3ADidoni/fonts/)  
Doesnâ€™t have the nice alternate ampersand,though.
Is Didoni a true digital version of Pistilli Roman?
